      • getEntity

        public com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity getEntity(java.lang.String type)
        Gets the first entity of 'type' added to the World. Useful if you have a single entity type such as 'player'
        Parameters:
        type - type of entity to get (used in addEntity)
        Returns:
        the first entity identified by 'type'
